mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book ( title, title_url, author, publisher, isbn, datetime, price, page, book_size ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{title_url}, #{author}, #{publisher}, #{isbn}, #{datetime}, #{price}, #{page}, #{book_size} )
mapper.select: SELECT no, title, title_url, author, publisher, isbn, datetime, price, page, book_size FROM book WHERE isbn=#{isbn}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book_review ( book_no, member_no, rating, reviewCmt ) VALUES ( #{book_no}, (SELECT no FROM member WHERE id=#{id}), #{rating}, #{reviewCmt} )
mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT count(1) FROM book_review WHERE book_no=#{bookno}) AS reviewCount, ROUND((SELECT AVG(rating) FROM book_review WHERE book_no = #{bookno}),0) AS ratingSum, review_no, book_no, rating, reviewCmt, date, id, name FROM book_reviewview WHERE book_no=#{bookno}
